reviews.review_msg: I would do anything for Remi, including jump off a bridge for him. He is the most amazing professor I have ever had.
Remi is a kind prof. Always encourages students to speak in class and sincerely wants you to do the best. He is willing to give helpful feedback and is open to communicating.
amazing professor! a relatively easy marker too
Rémi is a wonderful prof and I would highly recommend taking a course with him. He adapted his entire course content because of the pandemic and it alleviated a lot of stress on us, students.

Extremely eloquent speaker, engaging and insightful. Content was pertinent to the class and very thought provoking. I had him in my first year and honestly his existence made me consistently disappointed in the quality of the other professors I would eventually encounter.

He is a very respectable professor, very intelligent and is very knowledgeable about what he teaches. He also responds to questions very clearly and tries to help students understand the material as best they can. His exams were essentially composed of the material he gave in his notes, so make sure you study those well.

Remi is an awesome prof. He's very respected by students, very very nice and helpful and his lectures are really enjoyable. He's extremely clear and concise and there's no BS when it comes to assignments. I've taken 2 courses with him so far and he's one of my 2 favorite profs at SFU. Strongly recommend taking his classes.
Rémi was an amazing teacher: comprehensive, understanding, helpful. This class was based on midterms and papers, very easy to stay up to date with the lectures if you go to class and the tutorials.
he's super easy-going and wants you to do well. that said, it's not like he's going to give you free grades either. but he will do all he can to help you get the high grade you want.
Always really clear on what he's looking for and understanding of how busy student life can be, enthusiastic and takes the time to fully explain challenging concepts
He's a good teacher, but I didn't learn well with him, mainly because he was distracting. If you know what he looks like, you'll understand.

Dr. Léger is an amazing prof who is young and inspirational. Very interesting perspective on minority rights in Canada. His lectures are insightful and his assignments are very fair and straightforward. Always available for extra help during office hours and seems like a very kind person who is genuinely interested in his students' success! A+
How can you not take his classes Very interesting lectures and fair grader. A definite yes on your list of profs to choose.
BEST TEACHER EVER! HELPFUL, COMPREHENSIVE, ALWAYS ABLE TO EXTRA HOURS, VERY INTELLIGENT.
Very straightforward lectures and exams, boring textbook, but good looking!
